section.title: Overview
section.para: This module provides all functionality to build an IMS ICSCF.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para: The Following modules must be loaded before this module:

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para: This modules requires the Kamailio internal IMS library.

section.title: route_lir_user_unknown (string)
section.para: This is the route which is executed if HSS returns "user unknown" in LIR

section.title: route_uar_user_unknown (string)
section.para: This is the route which is executed if HSS returns "user unknown" in UAR.

section.title: scscf_entry_expiry (integer)
section.para: This is the time in s after which S-CSCF entries in the I-CSCF's SCSCF list will expire.

section.title: cxdx_forced_peer (string)
section.para: FQDN of Diameter Peer (HSS) to use for communication (UAR, LIR). If you use this, the routing defined in your diameter xml configuration file (CDP) will be ignored and as a result you will lose the benefits of load balancing and failover.

section.title: cxdx_dest_realm (string)
section.para: Destination realm to be used in Diameter messags to HSS

section.title: use_preferred_scscf_uri (int)
section.para: Whether or not this ICSCF has a preferred S-CSCF to use when the HSS returns a list of SCSCFs. 0 means this I-CSCF has no preferred SCSCF. 1 means it has a preferred S-CSCF.

section.title: preferred_scscf_uri (string)
section.para: If use_preferred_scscf_uri is set then this is the URI of the preferred SCSCF.
